title: Elise Spiderlings Scaling
body: I’m currently have success with demon shapeshifter, and naturally Elise is a perfect early fit. However, there’s one thing I don’t understand about her ability. I know the individual spiderlings have a set 500 hp, but does their damage scale with Elise items/tier?

replies.body:
They dont scale at all.
Elise is the worst individual champion in the game.
I believe the spiders don't scale at all, only the number that pop out (and her lifesteal, of course).
